page.title: 18Pastimes.
page.content: Fishing is enormously popular and its popularity is still growing. Most anglers seem to start on local canals and move onto the many {local fishing {clubs}who travel out of the area for {match fishing. }The populariy of football as a spectator sport seems to be diminishing (WBA, Wolves, Walsall and Aston Villa are all very close, {WBA }is the most popular) but its popularity as a participation sport is growing, particularly the {Sunday {Leagues.}There is a lot of pressure on the parks pitches and the swimming baths in the area who get very crowded. With the succesful {Tipton {Harriers }in the area, athletics remains popular and many school children said they liked going to the {speedway.}There is an increase in the popularity of breeding and keeping {Bull Terriers.}
